title: Wallpapers daily feed from NASA ISS won't disable
content: Uninstall clear cache restart device have feedback to Google and NASA complained asked a friend googled the shit out of it. Apparently you have to delete the APK but I shouldn't have to as I want the app I just don't want the daily updates anymore but there is no option to stop it.
category: Homescreen and Launcher, Google Pixel 3 XL
